snippet: The Nature Conservancy is earning money from an oil well on land it controls in Texas, despite pledging a decade ago not to permit new oil and gas drilling on land supposedly set aside for conservation.
abstract: Nature Conservancy continues earning money from oil well on land it controls in Texas, despite pledging a decade ago not to permit new oil and gas drilling on land; revelation comes in book This Changes Everything: Capitalism vs the Climate by activist Naomi Klein; group argues it has had no choice because of terms of lease it signed years ago; property is supposed to be a refuge for the endangered Attwater’s prairie chicken.
lead_paragraph: The Nature Conservancy is earning money from an oil well on land it controls in Texas, despite pledging a decade ago not to permit new oil and gas drilling on land supposedly set aside for conservation.

headline.main: Group Earns Oil Income Despite Pledge on Drilling
headline.print_headline: Group Earns Oil Income Despite Pledge on Drilling

keywords.name: creative_works
